value.title: Implement and manage storage for Azure administrators
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage storage as an Azure administrators.

topItems.title: Create an Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Discover ways to use an Azure Storage account to manage your data for billing, access, and storage location of your blobs, files, queues, and tables.

topItems.title: Choose the right disk storage for your virtual machine workload
topItems.excerpt: Azure provides a variety of disk storage options for virtual machine workloads. Identify the features of capabilities of each type to ensure your application performs optimally.

topItems.title: Provide disaster recovery by replicating storage data across regions and failing over to secondary location
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to provide disaster recovery by replicating storage data across regions and failing over to secondary location.

topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

topItems.excerpt: Manage users and groups in Azure Active Directory

topItems.title: Allow users to reset their password with Azure Active Directory self-service password reset
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to allow users to reset their password with Azure Active Directory self-service password reset.

topItems.title: Manage access to an Azure subscription by using Azure role-based access control (RBAC)
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to assign management access to a subscription by using Azure role-based access control.

value.title: Secure your cloud data
value.excerpt: This learning path helps you leverage the built-in Azure services for securing app data, ensuring that only authorized services and clients have access.

topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure can help you protect the workloads that you run both in the cloud and in your on-premises datacenter.

topItems.title: Top 5 security items to consider before pushing to production

topItems.title: Configure security policies to manage data
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to set up policies to classify, retain, and protect your cloud-based data.

topItems.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

value.title: Use visual tools to create machine learning models with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Use visual tools to create machine learning models with Azure Machine Learning

topItems.title: Use automated machine learning in Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Training a machine learning model is an iterative process that requires time and compute resources. Automated machine learning can help make it easier.

topItems.title: Create a Regression Model with Azure Machine Learning designer
topItems.excerpt: Regression is a supervised machine learning technique used to predict numeric values. Learn how to create regression models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

topItems.title: Create a classification model with Azure Machine Learning designer
topItems.excerpt: Classification is a supervised machine learning technique used to predict categories or classes. Learn how to create classification models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

topItems.title: Create a Clustering Model with Azure Machine Learning designer
topItems.excerpt: Clustering is an unsupervised machine learning technique used to group similar entities based on their features. Learn how to create clustering models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: AZ-400: Develop an instrumentation strategy
value.excerpt: Develop an effective instrumentation strategy through logging, telemetry, and monitoring and prepare for Exam AZ-400: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions.

topItems.title: Capture Web Application Logs with App Service Diagnostics Logging
topItems.excerpt: Learn about how to capture trace output from your Azure web apps. View a live log stream and download logs files for offline analysis.

topItems.title: Control and organize Azure resources with Azure Resource Manager
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Resource Manager to organize resources, enforce standards, and protect critical assets from deletion.

topItems.title: Introduction to App Center
topItems.excerpt: Explore Azure App services to find ways to simplify creation and integration as you build, distribute, test, and analyze usage of yours apps.

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to adjust your capacity based on workload and how to optimize network performance, storage, and database performance.

value.excerpt: Learn how to deploy and configure Azure compute resources and prepare for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

topItems.excerpt: This module guides you through options for virtual machines in Azure, creating and connecting a Linux virtual machine, and configuring your network settings.

topItems.title: Create a Windows virtual machine in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn to create an Azure virtual machine in minutes that can be used like a local physical desktop or server.

topItems.title: Manage virtual machines with the Azure CLI
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the cross-platform Azure CLI to create, start, stop, and perform other management tasks related to virtual machines in Azure.

topItems.title: Add and size disks in Azure virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn about your virtual machine storage options and how to choose between standard and premium, managed and unmanaged disks for your Azure virtual machine.

value.title: Secure your cloud applications in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to secure your Azure apps and associated data with encryption, certificates, and policy.

topItems.excerpt: Discover the tools that Azure provides to help you design a secure environment throughout your infrastructure, data, network, and applications.

topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create an Azure Key Vault to store secret values and how to enable secure access to the vault.

topItems.excerpt: You will learn how to use virtual machine extensions to automate virtual machine deployments.

value.title: Build great solutions with the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework
value.excerpt: Learn how to design and build secure, scalable, high-performing solutions in Azure using the pillars of the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework.

topItems.title: Introduction to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework
topItems.excerpt: Learn how using key principles throughout your cloud architecture can help you design and build a solid architectural foundation that you can continuously improve.

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Cost optimization
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the cost optimization pillar of the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework to design a cloud-based architecture that is efficient, eliminates waste, and gives you full visibility into where your money is spent on cloud resources.

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to design an Azure architecture that uses modern practices and gives you full visibility into what's happening in your environment.

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to adjust your capacity based on workload and how to optimize network performance, storage, and database performance.

topItems.excerpt: Master securing your Azure workloads with Azure Security Center. In this module, youll discover how to detect and respond to threats with Azure Security Center.

topItems.excerpt: In this module, youll use the alert capabilities of Azure Security Center to watch for and respond to threats.

value.title: Choose the best Azure service to automate your business processes
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll discuss how to choose the appropriate Azure service to integrate and automate business processes.

value.title: Architect network infrastructure in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to architect a secure, flexible, network infrastructure in Azure and connect on-premises networks to your Azure resources.

topItems.title: Connect your on-premises network to Azure with VPN Gateway
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the virtual private network (VPN) gateway options in Azure and typical scenarios for using a VPN. Create and test VPNs to securely connect sites to Azure.

topItems.title: Connect your on-premises network to the Microsoft global network by using ExpressRoute
topItems.excerpt: Connect your on-premises systems and users to Azure and Office 365 by using ExpressRoute for private, dedicated, and guaranteed throughput connectivity.

topItems.excerpt: Find out how Azure network security groups and service endpoints help you secure your virtual machines and Azure services from unauthorized network access.

topItems.title: Distribute your services across Azure virtual networks and integrate them by using virtual network peering
topItems.excerpt: Use virtual network peering to enable communication across virtual networks in a way that's secure and minimally complex.

topItems.excerpt: You will learn how to configure blob storage including tiers and object replication.

topItems.excerpt: You will learn how to configure common storage security features like storage access signatures.

topItems.title: Configure Azure files and Azure File Sync

topItems.excerpt: You will learn how to configure storage with tools like Storage Explorer and AZCopy.
